entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with flurries. 30 percent chance of flurries over the Highlands this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 7:05 PM ADT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:05 PM ADT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 7:05 PM ADT Saturday 8 April 2023
